Articles.Content: Does anyone have one that is available to download? I have a few ship that ran out of fuel before I could de-orbit.
No, sorry, but I recommend getting some rendevous practice before you even think of going after that debris. Best of luck!
It\'s pretty hard due to phantom force from debris, once you grab them they will spin your ship like crazy. Here are pictures from the test I did.

I made one with a similar set up.

http://youtu.be/5-nTwIznBKI

Landing legs are not the best things to grab spent boosters though. It takes a lot of skill to knock them out of orbit.

Here\'s the craft file as well.. (it\'s a newer model with some slight improvements to the old one in the video though)
